subject: Fwd: Redlines for Slate Plus Chris Kirk standalone
body:
On Feb. 23, at 12:44 PM, Jennifer Lai wrote:
Would you mind sending to me? I'll add and change the ticket in JIRA

Sent from my iPhone

Begin forwarded message:

From: Abby McIntyre <abby.mcintyre@slate.com>
Date: February 23, 2015 at 12:17:51 PM EST
To: "Lai, Jennifer" <Jennifer.Lai@slate.com>
Subject: Re: Redlines for Slate Plus Chris Kirk standalone

If he can add to the ticket and have art upload that'd be best. Thanks! 

From: <Lai>, Jennifer <Jennifer.Lai@slate.com>
Date: Monday, February 23, 2015 12:15 PM
To: Abby McIntyre <abby.mcintyre@slate.com>
Subject: Re: Redlines for Slate Plus Chris Kirk standalone

Hey Abby,


You're right! Yes, not supposed to really be in the copy. Chris needs to put in some screenshots of his Fresca in there -- what's best way to do that? Should I have him upload to JIRA and then have art place, or you place? What's best?


From: Abby McIntyre
Sent: Monday, February 23, 2015 12:12 PM
To: Lai, Jennifer
Subject: Redlines for Slate Plus Chris Kirk standalone
 
Hey Jen,

One question, marked in the doc (there's a place where there's something in brackets â€¦ looks kind of like a note; I wasn't sure if that was supposed to be in there?). Thanks!
